whatToExpect.heading: What to Expect
whatToExpect.step1Desc: Your package will arrive in discrete, eco-friendly packaging. Each container is sealed for freshness.
whatToExpect.step2Desc: For best results, start with a clean litter box:
whatToExpect.step2Item1: Clean and refresh your litter box
whatToExpect.step2Item2: Sprinkle a thin layer of Purrify on top
whatToExpect.step2Item3: No need to mix - it works from the surface
whatToExpect.step3Desc: Most customers notice a difference within 60 seconds! The activated carbon traps ammonia molecules instantly - no masking, just real odor elimination.
whatToExpect.proTipText: A little goes a long way! Use just enough to lightly cover the surface. Over-application won't hurt, but it's not necessary.

shareSection.heading: Share the Freshness

problem.headline: Tired of Holding Your Breath?

points: Guests arriving and you rush to check the litter box

Constantly buying air fresheners that don't work
Worrying your home smells like a cat lives there
